title: Break the Border: Rebirth of Echoes
original_name: BREAK THE BORDER rebirth of ECHOES
sinopse:
High school freshman Sei Igarashi has quit basketball after an incident. However, he comes across a girl, Asuka Shinjo, playing basketball and is inspired to play again. Sei takes an interest in the unfriendly Asuka. The two develop a bond as they try to make it to the nationals.

(Source: TVtropes)
